title: Idea for Friends List
body:
I add a ton of notes to my friends list so I can remember who is who. This also keeps me in the loop regarding my friends if they decide to do a summoner name change. It would be awesome if when you type in the search section it also searches through your friend notes.

For example, if I type in "James" I would see all summoner names and summoner's with "James" in their notes section.

What does everyone think?
